result.adr_address: Mykoly Bazhana Ave, 1-П, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02000
result.name: Obaldini

reviews.text:
I ordered Hawaiian pizza 45 cm on April 12 through the website, it was delivered in 1.5 hours. It was already cold. There was not enough toppings on the huge pizza, there were practically no pineapples and chicken, orange spots on the sides were all sauce. The taste is not very good, the dough is fresh.

After leaving a bad review, they called the next day, apologized, offered a gift pizza, and said that they would improve. Today, April 17, they brought the same large Hawaiian one, but I asked to add mushrooms - everything was as needed. This time it was delivered faster, the pizza was warm, sealed in foil to keep it from getting cold. It’s nice that there is a lot more filling, no empty spaces, a lot of cheese, more sauce. Already much better than last time. In terms of taste, I would say it’s still a 4 minus. But it is clear that the company is trying to improve and the opinions of customers are important to them. Plus for your efforts and service))

The first two photos are unsuccessful pizza 12.04, the next couple of photos are pizza 17.04)

Pizza is nothing at all. The only plus is that the cheese is normal, the filling itself is crushed as much as possible and there is almost none. Pepperoni pizza - I didn’t even understand what kind of pizza it was, they just chopped smoked sausage into small pieces, there’s no toppings or cheese near the sides, you can see in the photo, but it’s not cheese, it’s just tomato sauce, and it’s yellow because there’s almost none) . We supplemented the pepperoni with mushrooms to make it seem more visible) in Fore under the house you can order much tastier pizza)
Large sides, scanty filling (more cheese than other ingredients). Even with sides, the diameter is 24 cm, instead of the stated 25. The taste is not at all what we expected. 2 out of 5

The pizza is simply terrible, and they set the price like good pizzerias. The dough itself is bland, there is little filling and I generally doubt that all the ingredients are included, everything is covered in cheese; you can’t understand the taste. In the photo, I specifically put a quarter of a piece of “peperoni type” next to it, the first is a QUARTER OF A PIECE!!! Those. two slices of sausage made one pizza. I’m generally silent about the “Tsarskaya” pizza, which should contain Salmon and Perch; if something red slips through, then the perch is only in the recipe. I wanted to ask a question to those who cook this, are you serious??? Why so brazenly deceive us consumers??
I have many friends and acquaintances who live or are going to live in the residential complex "City of Flowers", consider yourself a reputation already made

We ordered a 30cm BBQ pizza. Delivered quite quickly, the courier was a very nice man, he looked neat, he was even wearing a mask...
But the pizza itself is a C grade. The dough is very mediocre and not baked everywhere (after reading the reviews I realized that this is not uncommon), the filling is also mediocre (there are not many ingredients and their quality is cheap), I didn’t understand the sauce to be honest... but oh well, BBQ sauce here is not for everyone the sauce is more a matter of taste. But I didn’t feel the taste of it. CHEESE is one of the fundamental ingredients of pizza! It’s more likely not cheese, but a cheese product! As soon as the pizza cools down a little in your mouth, you immediately feel as if you are chewing the sole (((((( Well, the cherry on top of this whole culinary masterpiece is FOIL))) on which the pizza rushes on the way to you)) The packaging is normal. There are napkins and toothpicks in the box and even salt and pepper for some reason))
